sense.gloss: to hang, to suspend, to sling, to wear (e.g. a sword), to put up (e.g. a shelf)
to hoist an opponent off of his feet by his loincloth
to turn upwards (as if being pulled), to be slanted (of eyes)
to pucker (e.g. of a seam), to be pulled tight

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はシャツを|↑吊↑↓つ↓る|している。
てるてる↑坊主↑↓ぼうず↓、↑逆↑↓さか↓さまに|↑吊↑↓つ↓る|してたら、あした↑雨↑↓あめ↓になるかな？
sdata.e: If you hang a teru teru bozu upside down, do you think it will bring rain tomorrow?
